snippet.title: Slackers - Carts of Glory - Announcement Trailer [Indie Game 2024 Shopping Cart Downhill Race]
snippet.description:
😴 Think steering and brakes are overrated?!

🚀Get ready for Slackers Carts of Glory! 🚀

🎮 New controls system! 🎮

- Race at Crazy Speed in a Shopping Cart with no brakes! 🛒💨
- Find shortcuts, dodge obstacles, and get to the supermarket before it closes! ⏱️🏅

Are you up for the challenge? 🤪 Let's roll! 🛒💨

⭐ Follow us on Steam and Add it to your Wishlist!  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2354000/Slackers__Carts_of_Glory/
🌟  Instagram @slackerscartsofglory
